name: Explore New Worlds
description:
Use your hands to interact with holograms and navigate across our solar system. Travel to the rings of Saturn, the icy surface of Triton, the craters of Mercury and more. Requires Leap Motion tracker for hand interactions. 

Now updated with improved Orion hand tracking and SteamVR support. Vive controllers can also be used for interaction, but I still recommend hand-tracking if you have a Leap. v0.7 has not been tested with a Rift, but should still work. If you have issues with the Rift, use v0.5
